pages.text: Use different Fullbottles on this block to obtain Sclashjellies$(br2)Drops:$(li)$(l:build/items/sclash_jelly)Empty Sclashjelly$(/l) (from an $(l:build/items/full_bottle)Empty Bottle$(/l))$(li)$(l:build/items/dragon_sclash_jelly)Dragon Sclashjelly$(/l) (from a $(l:build/items/dragon_full_bottle)Dragon Fullbottle$(/l))$(li)$(l:build/items/robot_sclash_jelly)Robot Sclashjelly$(/l) (from a $(l:build/items/robot_full_bottle)Robot Fullbottle$(/l))$(li)$(l:build/items/crocodile_crack_full_bottle)Crocodile Crack Fullbottle$(/l) (from a $(l:build/items/lost_bat_full_bottle)Lost Bat Fullbottle$(/l))
